short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View your chess.com games from your opponent's perspective in real-time while playing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your gameplay experience on chess.com with the ability to view the chess board from your opponent's perspective in real-time. With MirrorBoard, you can easily preview your opponent's moves as if you were sitting on their side of the board, gaining invaluable insights to outmaneuver your adversary. Seamlessly integrated with chess.com, MirrorBoard offers a unique and innovative way to analyze positions and plan your strategy. 
A real-time, mirrored duplicate of your ongoing game will appear on the right side of your screen. Every move made by either player updates instantly.
It displays your arrows, last move yellow squares, pre-move red squares, and the possible moves dots in real-time.
